person.persName: George Knight McCoy (Clark County, Indiana, assistant surgeon, 35th IN Inf & 1st IN Heavy Artillery USA)

body.p: Clark County, Indiana, assistant surgeon and soldier. Clark County native. Son of Louis McCoy and Rebecca Hester McCoy. Student in Charlestown, Indiana, in 1850. Attended DePauw University in Indiana. Graduated with an M.D. from Louisville Medical College in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1856. Served in the 35th Indiana Infantry Regiment and the 1st Indiana Heavy Artillery as assistant surgeon until his death by suicide in New Orleans, Louisiana, on December 18, 1864.
